snippet.title: This Bed We Made - Official Release Date Trailer | The MIX Next August 2023
snippet.description: This Bed We Made will be available on October 4, 2023. Watch the latest trailer for This Bed We Made for another look at this upcoming third-person mystery game, including gameplay and story. In This Bed We Made, you play as a maid in a 1950s hotel and snoop around strangers' rooms to uncover their deadly secrets. Discover what links guests together in this tale of love, heartbreak, and murder.
